name: Numbers Super Challenge - The Speed Match Series
name_original: Numbers Super Challenge - The Speed Match Series
description:
• Numbers Super Challenge •

Numbers Super Challenge is an addicting and fun matching game that will test your ability to problem solve, despite its simple design. The objective is to match the correct pair of numbers as fast as you can before the entire grid fills up. Sounds simple? It's not!

• FEATURES •

- One touch controls
- Tap on the numbers to match them
- Several modes of play
- Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to fully master

Match the pairs as fast as you can!

- Simple controls
- Addicting gameplay
- High score
- Clear and simple UI
What are you waiting for? GET IT NOW!
